page.title: 18PIER PAVILION IN HERNE BAY
page.content: The Pier Pavilion is the main Sports Centre in Herne Bay and it is the best in the area. Many clubs make use of the main hall and of the smaller rooms which are cheaper to hire. Also individuals may book the facilities for their sport with the squash and table tennis rooms being particularly popular. The high standard of Herne Bay's roller hockey is maintained in this pavilion with National League matches played at the week ends. Basketball, gymnastics, keep fit, badminton, football and volleyball are other sports which make use of the main arena. Although the pavilion is a great asset to the town there were doubts raised as to whether it should have been built in such an exposed position as it is liable to damage during storms.
